answerText: Niels Henrik David Bohr[10] Like many other famous physicists, Bohr famously attended the fifth iteration of this international conference at which he told another scientist to "stop telling God what to do."
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 14 | 15 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This scientist predicted the existence of hafnium. [10] Name this Danish scientist who developed a model of the atom with the nucleus and the centre and electron orbitals around it that only really works for Hydrogen.
